DataValues.Description: Unique integer identifier for each data value.

The numeric value of the observation. For Categorical variables, a number is stored here. The Variables table has DataType as Categorical and the Categories table maps from the DataValue onto Category Description.
Full name of the sampling site.
Integer identifier that references the site at which the observation was measured. This links data values to their locations in the Sites table
Integer identifier that references the variable that was measured. This links data values to their variable in the Variables table.
Integer identifier giving the level of quality control that the value has been subjected to. This references the QualityControlLevels table.

Sites.Description: Unique Identifier for each sampling location
Code used by organization that collects the data to identify the site
Full name of the sampling site.
Sites.Example: LOGAN RIVER ABOVE STATE DAM, NEAR LOGAN,UT

Sites.Description: Longitude in decimal degrees. East positive, West negative.
Elevation of sampling location (in m). If this is not provided it needs to be obtained programmatically from a DEM based on location information.
Name of state in which the monitoring site is located.
Name of county in which the monitoring site is located.
